summary: WHILE DRIVING AND WITHOUT WARNING THE VEHICLE'S TIRE WOULD NOT GRIP ON THE WET ROAD.   *NLM   THE INCIDENT HAPPENED WHEN THE ROAD WAS WET AND WHILE THE CONSUMER WAS GOING AROUND A CURVE.  THE VEHICLE ALSO DEVELOPED A VIBRATION IN THE STEERING WHEEL.  THE DEALER WAS UNABLE TO FIX THE VEHICLE AND SUGGESTED THE VEHICLE WAS LIKE THIS WHEN THE IT WAS PURCHASED.   (TIRE MODEL/RADIAL GT)   *SCC   *JB
